core_team.name: Dr. Brandon Brown
core_team.bio: Dr. Brown leads WRCCDC operations and coordinates with regional partners. He is a faculty member at Coastline Community College and has been involved with CCDC since 2015.

core_team.name: Example Volunteer
core_team.bio: Leading red team operations with over 10 years of penetration testing experience. Specializes in infrastructure attacks and social engineering.

red_team.name: Example Red Team Member
red_team.bio: Professional security consultant specializing in web application security and network penetration testing.

white_team.name: Example White Team Member
white_team.bio: Network engineer with expertise in competition infrastructure and automated scoring systems.

mentors.name: Example Mentor
mentors.bio: Security engineer at a major tech company, mentoring teams on defense strategies and career development.
